    • unit

    # unit

    Ensures a value is a CSS formatted unit.

    unit(value, [uom = 'px'])

    • value string|number
      The unit value.

    • uom px
      The unit of measure.

    Returns string

    # Example

    unit(12) // return: 12px
unit('12px') // return: 12px
unit(10, '%') // return: 12%
